issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Can we add the "deploytype" attribute to the "ti.enroll" call? It is also in the ti.start, which means we'll get it twice in some instances, but having that data at the time we're processing the incoming enroll event would be really helpful. (Created a separate ticket for the iphone case.) Also, could we rev the specification version "ver" to 2 with the GA release?

{html}

comments.body:
{html}

(from [39700af8500dbe775c850a276ff26f01ff2031d9]) [#139 state:resolved] Updated ti.enroll to include deploytype http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/39700af8500db...

{html}
